name: Master's Fury
overview:
A follow-up to the 1994 arcade release Dragon Master (드래곤마스타), this 2D fighting game is heavily influenced by its more famous ancestors, Street Fighter II and Fatal Fury. Players choose one of ten different characters from around the world and travel across the planet to take part in one-on-one fights. Controls work essentially the same as in most other 2D fighting games, with each character having a unique set of both normal and special moves.

The 1997 PlayStation remake release of Master's Fury was titled The Master's Fighter.
